recommended_action:
Perform the following to enable log file validation on a given trail:
Via the management Console
1. Sign in to the AWS Management Console and open the IAM console at
https://console.aws.amazon.com/cloudtrail
2. Click on Trails on the left navigation pane
3. Click on target trail
4. Within the Storage Location section click on the edit icon (pencil)
5. Click on the Yes radio button in section Enable log file validation
6. Click Save
rationale: Enabling log file validation will provide additional integrity checking of CloudTrail logs.

LogFileValidationEnabled.errorMessage: CloudTrail does not have log-file validation enabled.
